key_facts: McKinsey & Company is approaching its 100th anniversary next year.
McKinsey's revenue growth slowed to around 2% in the most recent year.
McKinsey reduced its headcount by approximately 5,000 people since late 2023.
McKinsey acquired at least 16 technology consultancies between 2013 and 2023.
McKinsey expanded into digital practice, operations, procurement, and supply chain advisory services.
Boston Consulting Group (BCG) has continued growing robustly despite macroeconomic uncertainty.
In 2012, McKinsey was about twice as large as BCG in revenue.
As of last year, McKinsey was only about a fifth larger than BCG in revenue.
BCG is projected to overtake McKinsey in revenue by the year after next if current trends continue.
Palanteer experienced nearly 50% revenue growth in the second quarter of this year.
Palanteer is now more valuable than Chevron or Coca-Cola.
Palanteer sells software tools that help companies feed data into AI models.
Palanteer deploys engineers directly with clients to embed AI technology.
OpenAI is beginning to offer consulting-like services involving on-site deployment.
key_opinions: McKinsey has fallen below fighting weight despite being a dominant player in consulting.
McKinsey’s expansion was driven by a deliberate strategy rather than passive demand.
BCG has executed its digital expansion more effectively than McKinsey.
The rise of AI-focused firms like Palanteer poses a direct threat to McKinsey’s service offerings.
Technology providers may increasingly need to work directly with clients to improve their tools.
AI could eventually disrupt the core strategic advisory business model of firms like McKinsey.
Senior partners may welcome fewer junior staff due to automation, but this risks fee compression.
McKinsey’s intellectual property libraries provide some protection against AI disruption.
AI tools will likely become democratized, leveling the playing field across organizations.
Consultants have a proven ability to adapt to new management fads and turn them into profitable services.
The consulting industry is entering a period of profound change.
